title: FPS drops 9.16
body:
at patch 9.15 I had between 120-180 fps and when there was a big team fight I had 60-80 fps and ever since patch 9.16 I get 90-120 fps and in team fights I get 45-60 is there anything to do about it?
edit: after the little update my fps just went down to the ground. now I have 80 fps in lane and in team fights 40 it's so hard to play like that I just don't know what to do.

replies.body: I am also seeing lower FPS the past few days...
FPS has always tended to drop in team fights.
yea but to 40 when the last patch I had 60
I was running league pretty smooth, like 300 fps in patch 9.15 but ever since 9.16 got released i am having fps drops like everytime there is a fight or someone uses his ability

I'm having the same issue and i know 100% its league client/server side because this is the 3rd time im having a massive FPS drop after a league patch.  I usually play at 140+ FPS but after this drop its closer to 20 fps.  There's nothing wrong with my PC.  10% CPU usage, 90% of RAM is free, no other software is running on my PC.  Please fix this.
I have fps drops too after this patch. Fom 144 to 40-60 and im 100% sure this isn't my fault. This problem is from Riot and they have to repair it.
Anyone have a solution to do this or do we need riot support?

My friend and I have been having massive FPS drops too, no issues at all before Patch 9.16. FPS goes from around the solid 90's to next to 0. 

My specs are a GTX 1060, i7, 16GB RAM, so I should not be seeing this, ESPECIALLY when moving the visual settings down to "Low"

This is just plain frustrating to me.
Intel Xeon E3-1231 
 GTX 970 8gb ram

The fps drops seem to just appear at random. mostly when chars use abilities
mine is even worse, before i would be able to play averagely aroun 60-120 fps and now my fps doesnt go any higher than 40 and massive lag and crashes client too. riot needs to fix this asap
if your monitor refresh rate does not exceed your fps, it doesn't matter
Mine is even worse. My fps drops to 9 and 10.... I cannot really play right now. Will riot stuff see our reprots?

Hardware, software?

you provide zero information, so nobody can really answer.
i have GeForce GTX 880 and intel(r) core(tm) i5-4460 @ 3.20GHz and 8GB Ram.

I have GeForce GTX 1060, Ryzen 7 with 16GB Ram and I'm getting 10-20 fps at this after the 9.16 update (but I also updated my windows, so I don't know which one caused this fps drop....) I just don't know what I can do, I have tried restarting my computer.... *sigh*

> Ryzen 7 

Which model?

I got tripled minimum fps after using process lasso to lock the game to two cores on the first ccx.

I also have windows 10 I had an update this morning and it made the game run a little better and I also tried to close apps that are running in the background like discord, blizzard, steam, etc.
after I did that the game worked much better.
